commands.name: create sample project
commands.commandLine:
cd ${current.project.path} && npm install express@4.13.4 && express -f . && cp -rn /bitnami/mongodb/conf ${current.project.path} && npm install mongodb@2.1.18 --save && npm install && counter=0; until nc -z localhost 27017; do counter=$((counter+1)); if [ $counter == 10 ]; then echo "Error: Couldn't connect to MongoDB."; exit 1; fi; echo "Trying to connect to MongoDB at localhost. Attempt $counter."; sleep 5; done; echo "Connected to MongoDB database" && echo -e "



* Welcome to the Bitnami development container for Express *

A sample project has been created just for you, ready to be run.
For more information, please refer to README.md.



You may close this window."
